headline: Skyworks Solutions (SWKS) Stock Trades Down, Here Is Why
summary: Shares of wireless chips maker Skyworks Solutions (NASDAQ: SWKS) fell 3.2% in the afternoon session after a weak forecast from industry peer Texas Instruments sparked concerns about a slowdown in the semiconductor sector. Texas Instruments, one of the largest makers of analog chips, provided a lackluster forecast for the fourth quarter, with revenue and profit projections falling short of analyst estimates. This news raised concerns that the recovery in the semiconductor industry was sputtering.
